message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.CY, cs.AI 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security): The paper discusses security and privacy issues in blockchain-based energy trading, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing): The paper focuses on the use of blockchain, a distributed technology, in energy trading, which is a distributed process. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper discusses system optimization in blockchain-based energy trading, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
- cs.CY (Computers and Society): The paper discusses the impact of blockchain-based energy trading on the electrical power system, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): Although not the main focus of the paper, some of the existing energy trading schemes mentioned in the paper use AI techniques for optimization, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
